synopsis.text: Shun Godai is a young boy with a passion for football, but his wealthy and successful businessman grandfather has other plans - he wants Shun to follow in his footsteps down a more corporate path. Though torn, Shun hesitantly goes along with his grandfather's vision. However, after a fateful game of football at the Godai Resort with his friend Roberto, Shun's talent is spotted by a youth football team. This chance encounter sets off a chain of events that forces Shun to decide - should he live up to his family's expectations or bravely pursue his own dreams on the football pitch? Whichever path he takes will dramatically shape his future.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
